seo_en: Exchange, vulnerability detection, CVE-2021-26855, CVE-2021-41349, batch detection
summary: 该插件用于批量检测 Exchange 系统中的 CVE-2021-26855 和 CVE-2021-41349 漏洞，分别涉及 SSRF 和 XSS 风险。
summary_en: This plugin is used for batch detection of CVE-2021-26855 and CVE-2021-41349 vulnerabilities in the Exchange system, involving SSRF and XSS risks respectively.
